title: Typografische Gesellschaft München
content:
**[Indicies](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010230601/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indicies) : [Organizations](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010230601/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Organizations) : Typografische Gesellschaft München**

The Typographic Society of Munich, often refered to simply at the TGM. They sponsor exhibitions, lecture series, and other typography-related events, often in conjuction with the German Liason Committee of the [Type Directors Club](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010230601/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Type%20Directors%20Club).

[www.tgm-online.de/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010230601/http:/www.tgm-online.de/)
author: dan_reynolds
